founder.name: Vishnu
founder.title: Founder & CEO
founder.bio: Vishnu is a visionary entrepreneur and technology leader with over 10 years of experience in AI and education technology. He founded Vihaya with the mission to democratize learning through AI-powered personalization, making quality education accessible to developers worldwide.

company.name: Vihaya
company.mission: To democratize developer education through AI-powered personalization, making quality learning accessible to everyone, everywhere.
